flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This guide will show you how to use and maintain a soldering iron.
guide.introduction_rendered: This guide will show you how to use and maintain a soldering iron.
guide.summary: If you are having trouble with soldering, don't have any problems anymore, just read this guide. It step-by-step allows you to perfect this important skill.
guide.title: How to proporly use and maintain a soldering iron.
